channel.title: How would I add a new flag to all items, or specific items?
channel.description:
Hey guys would it be possible to add 2 new flags to the items in my server?
So I want to add a boolean to [u]all[/u] items in game. I don't want to say what it's for but it should be really obvious already. The specifics of this flag: Any item that has the flag true will be in a separate pile (each stackable item with this flag true). That's really it. Lol.
The other flag would be an int. But, I only want it to show on specific items. I will work the stacking based off the above.

item.title: How would I add a new flag to all items, or specific items?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Hey guys would it be possible to add 2 new flags to the items in my server?

So I want to add a boolean to all items in game. I don’t want to say what it’s for but it should be really obvious already.
The specifics of this flag:
Any item that has the flag true will be in a separate pile (each stackable item with this flag true).
That’s really it. Lol.

The other flag would be an int. But, I only want it to show on specific items. I will work the stacking based off the above.
